price: Saa ara na wo Wura Nyankopͻn asεm no yεε nokorε tiaa wͻn a wͻyii boniayε no, nokorε sԑ wͻyε amanehunu gya no mu nnipa.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika ḥaqqat kalimatu rabbika ʿalā alladhīna kafarū annahum aṣḥābu al-nāri
